snippet.title: 3 Minute Heroes | Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Presenting Sinkhole Studio's second steam project, '3 Minute Heroes'.

3 Minute Heroes is a real-time strategy game that combines the genres of tower defense, deck building, and roguelike. Place your champions, use cards, and keep your home safe for 3 minutes!

Buy Now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1475460/3_Minute_Heroes/
